column4: - it is a total pile of crap, an absolutely horrible program to have to work with
have you dealt with vs .net 2003?  The darn thing didn't even install properly.
- yeah I was a pro developer in vs .net 2003, and indeed it failed to install most times for most people while I worked with it, good luck, keep trying
The more I work with windows tools, the better I like linux :)
